title: Portrait of 'Annibali Carraccio'
marks:
Inscription

in plate in black: [ANNIBALI/ CARRA
description: monument (tombstone?) with circular portrait bust of a man in center; vines on both edges of monument meet at center top to form wreath; faces at upper corners; lion at lower right; lioness(?) at lower left; artist\'s pallet with brushes and ink bottle on right edge
